channel.title: Editable Server
channel.description:
I have been looking everywhere for a server that is editable in the things that i want, if you could post a link that has these requirements it would be much appreciated: . Commands editable . Npc location editable . Store content editable . Object location editable . Where pk is editable
Helpful things(doesn't need these) . Able to change texture of items . Able to change command of item (e.g. making a pineapple readable)
Link would be much appreciable

item.title: Editable Server
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

loling @ the trolls here.
bro all those are editable, although you might be asking for a program to do those?
Go to google and look and start dugging.

Read full topic

item.title: Editable Server

item.description:
@hunterowner3 wrote:

  2. You edited .class files.

I’m sorry, but this was one of the funniest things I’ve seen on this site. lololololololololol

item.title: Editable Server
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

[quote=“Sessy Pk3r, post:25, topic:411358”]I feel bad for this guy so I’ll try to help out. Click Start>Search then type in whatever you are looking for and the file should pop up. Open the file and hit ctrl+f then again type in what you’re looking for and you be able to find whatever it is you are looking for. Good luck

Sorry in advance if this was a grave dig. :|[/quote]

Why yes it was… If you knew it was a gravedig then why post?

Read full topic

item.title: Editable Server
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

I feel bad for this guy so I’ll try to help out. Click Start>Search then type in whatever you are looking for and the file should pop up. Open the file and hit ctrl+f then again type in what you’re looking for and you be able to find whatever it is you are looking for. Good luck

Sorry in advance if this was a grave dig.

Read full topic

item.title: Editable Server
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“mrduck, post:22, topic:411358”]Look, he starts nice: (but… looked everywhere? Check the “server downloads”-forum?)

[quote author=kya219 link=topic=512622.msg3720726#msg3720726 date=1313916164]
I have been looking everywhere for a server that is editable in the things that i want, if you could post a link that has these requirements it would be much appreciated.
Link would be much appreciable [/quote]

He even tries to impress you guys:

[quote author=kya219 link=topic=512622.msg3720729#msg3720729 date=1313916443]
i am i good coder and i have gone into those kind of folders(…)[/quote]

He really tries…:

Well you make me sound silly but yes, and as a matter of fact i can edit code with it working, but that is the code i dont want to edit, i have edited ALOT of the servers i have but the important things to edit indeed MAGICALLY DONT WORK, don’t ask me to explain it.

But then… he snaps.

[quote author=kya219 link=topic=512622.msg3720757#msg3720757 date=1313918294]
FCK, you bllsh*t people with your criticism did i ask for everything done for me, no! i did not, did i ask for criticism, no1 i did not, fuck. ima report u people if u troll once more.[/quote]

how the fuck do you think you’re helping?

So, because he tried so hard: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html Pick one![/quote]

Great observation LOL

To the original poster, if you are really that experienced at editing servers, I would suggest that you should get a blank source.

Read full topic

item.title: Editable Server

. Commands editable

Helpful things(doesn’t need these)
. Able to change texture of items
. Able to change command of item (e.g. making a pineapple readable)

Link would be much appreciable[/quote]

There all editable.

kya219:

i am i good coder and i have gone into those kind of folders, even deleting a part of the code doesn’t seem to change the output, most of the things above are in most rps but not all of them, and if you think you’re so smart “they’re all editable” then gimme a link like i asked.

Server Download Section, and perhaps try compiling what you edited.

Read full topic

item.title: Editable Server
item.dc:creator: @kya219 kya219
item.description:
@kya219 wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:12, topic:411358”][quote author=kya219 link=topic=512622.msg3720746#msg3720746 date=1313917462]

well in most, i delete a command or a teleport button in the emotes menu and when i play the game nothing has changed, all i can do atm is change content of stores and moves npc’s. All the other things i know how to do until i edit the code and nothing happens, i am a good coder tyvm but it seems this code is different to normal… in a different way.

So in other words you’re a good coder, but when you code something which you intend to do something, the code magically doesn’t work? Yet you’re good?

Well you make me sound silly but yes, and as a matter of fact i can edit code with it working, but that is the code i dont want to edit, i have edited ALOT of the servers i have but the important things to edit indeed MAGICALLY DONT WORK, don’t ask me to explain it.
[/quote]
You are forgetting to compile. /hesthebestcoderi’veevermet[/quote]

anyways, my original question goddammit gimme an easy to edit server in those aspects, not one that has custom content, not one with banks in inconvenient places, just plain old easy to edit rs, god, instead of criticism on how unbelievably horrible i am why not just give me an answer, this is server help NOT SERVER CRITICISM, POST YOUR CRAP IN THAT SECTION!

Read full topic

item.title: Editable Server
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:

[quote=“Coelho, post:12, topic:411358”][quote author=kya219 link=topic=512622.msg3720746#msg3720746 date=1313917462]

well in most, i delete a command or a teleport button in the emotes menu and when i play the game nothing has changed, all i can do atm is change content of stores and moves npc’s. All the other things i know how to do until i edit the code and nothing happens, i am a good coder tyvm but it seems this code is different to normal… in a different way.

So in other words you’re a good coder, but when you code something which you intend to do something, the code magically doesn’t work? Yet you’re good?

Well you make me sound silly but yes, and as a matter of fact i can edit code with it working, but that is the code i dont want to edit, i have edited ALOT of the servers i have but the important things to edit indeed MAGICALLY DONT WORK, don’t ask me to explain it.
[/quote]
You are forgetting to compile. /hesthebestcoderi’veevermet[/quote]

I lolled. Also in otherwords are you on about editing co-ordinates of shops?Editing text? so changing “You died” to “You died noob”?
That’s pretty complex you’re pretty good at coding.

Read full topic
